title: Top 5 Supports to Climb With for S8

replies.body: Am confused why it says Jayce but the picture is Le Blanc. I get she is a deceiver but still.

fixed
{{champion:161}} If he's a giant eye with tons of knowledge then he should be able to see everything meaning he doesn't need wards to apply vision on the map.

> {{champion:161}} If he's a giant eye with tons of knowledge then he should be able to see everything meaning he doesn't need wards to apply vision on the map.

Actually true, viable. Just start dark seal as support since no need for ward.
I am ok with nunu support and teemo support being niche support picks, even if the OP is not aware.
